AccessKeyId.Documentation: // The access key ID that identifies the temporary security credentials.

Expiration.Documentation: // The date on which the current credentials expire.

SecretAccessKey.Documentation: // The secret access key that can be used to sign requests.

SessionToken.Documentation: // The token that users must pass to the service API to use the temporary credentials.

// The string that identifies the federated user associated with the credentials,
